trans-unit.source: python-ntpdshm provides a Python interface to ntpd’s shared memory driver 28. A single class
trans-unit.target: python-ntpdshm provides a Python interface to ntpd’s shared memory driver 28. A single class

trans-unit.source: python-ntpdshm works with the following Python versions.
trans-unit.target: python-ntpdshm works with the following Python versions.

trans-unit.source: A just for fun example of using python-ntpdshm is to implement an “off by one second” reference time source for ntpd. While this example makes no sense at all for practical purposes it provides a useful template for how it all fits together.
trans-unit.target: A just for fun example of using python-ntpdshm is to implement an “off by one second” reference time source for ntpd. While this example makes no sense at all for practical purposes it provides a useful template for how it all fits together.

trans-unit.source: As this is somewhat cumbersome, there is a convenience method
trans-unit.target: Так как это несколько громоздко,есть удобный метод.

trans-unit.source: First we write the code for the reference clock.
trans-unit.target: Сначала мы пишем код для ссылочных часов.

trans-unit.source: In addition there are two pseudo properties that combine the second and microsecond attributes into “float” timestamps. These don’t support nanosecond precision as (as far as I know) it is not possible to detect whether ntpd does support nanosecond resolution.
trans-unit.target: In addition there are two pseudo properties that combine the second and microsecond attributes into “float” timestamps. These don’t support nanosecond precision as (as far as I know) it is not possible to detect whether ntpd does support nanosecond resolution.
